features: [The Portable design &Deep Clean]: The SYNHOPE water flosser is designed with telescopic water tank and integrated storage nozzle, which greatly reduces the volume of the product compared with similar products and is very convenient to carry around. SYNHOPE Water Flosser can offer high pressure water pulse 1200 times &140PSI strong water pressure, which is the most convenient and most effective way to floss, removing up to 99.9 percent of plaque from treated areas and improve gum health.

[3 clean modes & IPX7 Waterproof Design] :The water flosser has Soft,Pulse,Strong modes for choosing with Low-noise Design, which can meet various oral care needs.IPX7 water proof ensures the product is safe to use and prevents leaks.

[Telescopic water tank & Unique leak-proof design]:The upgraded telescopic fully open water tank greatly reduces the volume of the product, and presented three jet tips and portable storage bags, greatly increasing the convenience of carrying. It has an exclusive internal leak-proof and drainage device, which has a longer service life rather than similar products.

[Long Battery Lifetime & Portable Design]: With the portable size and lightweight ,the Powerful Lithium Battery is able to be used Continuously for 30 days once fully charged in Just 4 hours.It brings great convenience to your travels.And the long battery life is supported by USB charging.

[Support & Warranty]: SYNHOPE provide 30days no reason refund warranty and 24 hours technical support to ensure you make decision with ease and confidence. Package included: SYNHOPE Water Flosser x 1 , Replacement Jet Nozzles x4, USB cable x1, Instruction Manualx1. Search B09712KM1Q if you need more replacement nozzles

SYNHOPE is an ultra-small palm-sized flosser that is convenient for you to use in any place and easy to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super impressed with this little flosser
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use with a good battery life. Has made my daily oral hygiene routine more pleasant and my dentist agrees. Traveled with it and occasionally take it to work with me for a refresh. Packs small but is powerful. Definitely worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A handy portable water flosser
reviews.reviewText: I bought this water flosser a couple years ago and forgot about it. I’m getting ready to have my teeth straightened with Invisalign so I have started getting into the habit of water flossing again and brushing after every meal. I love this little gadget. I put it in my purse and take it to work with me. I also use it at home because it’s my only water flosser. There are 3 settings from soft to soft pulse to hard. The highest setting is pretty intense and hard. The lower two settings are too weak for me. The highest setting will take every little piece of stuck food out but it’s a tad too hard. There is enough water in the container to go around your teeth twice completely if you move quickly. Once around does a good job. I use it 2 to 3 times a day. It is rechargeable and the charge will last at least 3 days, maybe even more. The plastic water container comes off for cleaning, you just need to give it a good tug because it’s on tight. There’s no other maintenance required. Simple, portable and does a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, effective portable water flosser
reviews.reviewText: This small, convenient product is very effective and leaves my teeth feeling clean. I love it for travelling, as it fits easily with other toiletries and has been very reliable. I have crowns and an implant, so I really need to use it every night to remove food debris. The battery lasts a long time, and charging with a USB cord is easy. The water capacity is limited by it's small size, so I usually have to refill it and use a second tankful to feel like I've completely cleaned my teeth. On my unit, the nozzle was very difficult to remove at first; I had to grip it with my teeth to remove it from the unit for storage, but that got better over the months. It worked perfectly for 18 months, but it then suddenly stopped working. I need to call customer service to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I love this! It’s super compact and quite powerful - so much easier to use than the bigger water flosser types you can buy! I am using this every day with no problems - I think the size is enough for water and have not had any concerns. It’s not heavy and comes with optional heads. My only gripe is the “carry case” - not worth it - it needs a heavier case if you ask me but don’t let this stop you - very worth it if you don’t have counter space / travel / easy to fit on handbag if taking to work etc. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've only had the chance to use it twice, but it seems to be working great. I love how compact it is so I don't have to have yet another thing sitting on my bathroom countertop. It charged up fast, and was super easy to use.The tank part comes off so I'll be able to keep that clean, which is great.One thing that annoyed me, is that while testing the peridontal jet tip for the first time, the little plastic spout at the end came off completely. It doesn't seem possible to reattach it so either the one I received was damaged or they're just poorly made and not able to handle the force of the jet stream.If this thing lasts, it's a 5 star product, however, I'm deducting 2 stars for the unusable jet attachment and giving them a chance to make it right, after which I'll update my rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Gift & Perfect Size!!
reviews.reviewText: So far this product works well! It was a gift for my grandson who just got braces. He plans to use it at school & on a school trip!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel item
reviews.reviewText: Small powerful and runs forever without charging. I would definitely recommend.Only issues is the tips must be stored/ carried separately. The will not fit in the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great and fits perfectly in my purse. The only parts I don't like is it run outs of water quickly and the carry bag doesn't stay closed. But that is just minor to how great it works and is perfect to take every day with you.
Buen tamaño de viaje, útil, muy buena relación costo-calidad. Muy buena compra.
NÃO É FLEXIVEL.DEIXA A DESEJAR. NÃO COMPRARIA SE TIVESSE EXPERIMENTADO. .

reviews.reviewTitle: This little thing is AWESOME and actually makes flossing fun
reviews.reviewText: Small, portable, simple, powerful and highly effective.I hate flossing with waxed string. I find it very difficult to do a good job. So I took a chance on this little water flosser and am very impressed. It is easy to maneuver in your mouth, comes with tips suitable for people with braces, puts out lots of pressure and is adjustable.I've been using it for a few weeks and each time I do, I feel like I just had my teeth professionally cleaned. I tried it on some soap residue around the drain pipe on my sink and it lifted it easily - so I imagine that it is doing exactly the same for plaque on your teeth.This product is well worth the price IMHO.
Super good battery life. Waterproof, portable easy, Powerful, clean my tooth like magic!!
The pressure is low. The 5ank is small
